channel.title: Comments on: Changing a column that is already populated into a column that uses a sequence
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Nice. I guess I was looking for slightly different script (existing table without Id column, adding the Id column and then linking to sequence). Still, two missing steps are relatively easy to figure out. But if you can show this particular scenario in this blog for completion, that will be nice.
item.content:encoded: Nice. I guess I was looking for slightly different script (existing table without Id column, adding the Id column and then linking to sequence). Still, two missing steps are relatively easy to figure out. But if you can show this particular scenario in this blog for completion, that will be nice.
